title: Guest Co-Host Joe Amabile
description:
Grocery Store Joe joins Rachel as guest co-host this week. Joe talks about his life now with Kendall and why his bad haircut was to blame for him getting kicked off the first night of “The Bachelorette.” Plus, they’re answering fan e-mails. 

Be sure to rate and subscribe so you never miss an episode. 

Thanks to our sponsors:

Noom: Noom.com/BHH

Third Love: ThirdLove.com/Bachelor
